verses.verse: וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> said אֵלִיָּ֨הוּ <WH452> And Elijah הַתִּשְׁבִּ֜י <WH8664> the Tishbite מִתֹּשָׁבֵ֣י <WH8453> [who was] of the inhabitants גִלְעָד֮ <WH1568> of Gilead אֶל־ <WH413> to אַחְאָב֒ <WH256> unto Ahab חַי־ <WH2416> liveth יְהוָ֞ה <WH3068> [As] the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom עָמַ֣דְתִּי <WH5975> whom I stand לְפָנָ֔יו <WH6440> before אִם־ <WH518> surely יִהְיֶ֛ה <WH1961> become הַשָּׁנִ֥ים <WH8141> these years הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these טַ֣ל <WH2919> there shall not be dew וּמָטָ֑ר <WH4306> nor rain כִּ֖י <WH3588> there אִם־ <WH518> shall be neither לְפִ֥י <WH6310> but according דְבָרִֽי׃ <WH1697> to my word ס
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> And the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלָ֥יו <WH413> to him לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto him saying

לֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> Go מִזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> here וּפָנִ֥יתָ <WH6437> thee hence and turn לְּךָ֖ קֵ֑דְמָה <WH6924> thee eastward וְנִסְתַּרְתָּ֙ <WH5641> and hide בְּנַ֣חַל <WH5158> thyself by the brook כְּרִ֔ית <WH3747> Cherith אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> that פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> that [is] before הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <WH3383> Jordan

וְהָיָ֖ה <WH1961> become מֵהַנַּ֣חַל <WH5158> of the brook תִּשְׁתֶּ֑ה <WH8354> And it shall be [that] thou shalt drink וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָעֹרְבִ֣ים <WH6158> the ravens צִוִּ֔יתִי <WH6680> and I have commanded לְכַלְכֶּלְךָ֖ <WH3557> to feed שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> went וַיַּ֖עַשׂ <WH6213> and did כִּדְבַ֣ר <WH1697> according unto the word יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיֵּ֗לֶךְ <WH1980> went וַיֵּ֙שֶׁב֙ <WH3427> and dwelt בְּנַ֣חַל <WH5158> by the brook כְּרִ֔ית <WH3747> Cherith אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which עַל־ <WH5921> that פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> that [is] before הַיַּרְדֵּֽן׃ <WH3383> Jordan

וְהָעֹרְבִ֗ים <WH6158> And the ravens מְבִיאִ֨ים <WH935> brought ל֜וֹ לֶ֤חֶם <WH3899> him bread וּבָשָׂר֙ <WH1320> and flesh בַּבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> in the morning וְלֶ֥חֶם <WH3899> and bread וּבָשָׂ֖ר <WH1320> and flesh בָּעָ֑רֶב <WH6153> in the evening וּמִן־ <WH4480> from הַנַּ֖חַל <WH5158> of the brook יִשְׁתֶּֽה׃ <WH8354> and he drank

וַיְהִ֛י <WH1961> happened מִקֵּ֥ץ <WH7093> And it came to pass after יָמִ֖ים <WH3117> a while וַיִּיבַ֣שׁ <WH3001> dried up הַנָּ֑חַל <WH5158> that the brook כִּ֛י <WH3588> because לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> happened גֶ֖שֶׁם <WH1653> because there had been no rain בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> in the land ס
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> And the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלָ֥יו <WH413> to him לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto him saying

ק֣וּם <WH6965> Arise לֵ֤ךְ <WH1980> go צָרְפַ֙תָה֙ <WH6886> thee to Zarephath אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which לְצִיד֔וֹן <WH6721> which [belongeth] to Zidon וְיָשַׁבְתָּ֖ <WH3427> and dwell שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> there הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> behold צִוִּ֥יתִי <WH6680> there behold I have commanded שָׁ֛ם <WH8033> there אִשָּׁ֥ה <WH802> woman אַלְמָנָ֖ה <WH490> a widow לְכַלְכְּלֶֽךָ׃ <WH3557> there to sustain

וַיָּ֣קָם ׀ <WH6965> So he arose וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> and went צָרְפַ֗תָה <WH6886> to Zarephath וַיָּבֹא֙ <WH935> And when he came אֶל־ <WH413> to פֶּ֣תַח <WH6607> to the gate הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> of the city וְהִנֵּֽה־ <WH2009> behold שָׁ֛ם <WH8033> was there אִשָּׁ֥ה <WH802> woman אַלְמָנָ֖ה <WH490> behold the widow מְקֹשֶׁ֣שֶׁת <WH7197> [was] there gathering עֵצִ֑ים <WH6086> of sticks וַיִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> and he called אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH413> to her וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <WH559> to her and said קְחִי־ <WH3947> Fetch נָ֨א <WH4994> Please לִ֧י מְעַט־ <WH4592> me I pray thee a little מַ֛יִם <WH4325> water בַּכְּלִ֖י <WH3627> in a vessel וְאֶשְׁתֶּֽה׃ <WH8354> that I may drink

וַתֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> was going לָקַ֑חַת <WH3947> to fetch וַיִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> [it] he called אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH413> to her וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <WH559> to her and said לִֽקְחִי־ <WH3947> Bring נָ֥א <WH4994> Please לִ֛י פַּת־ <WH6595> me I pray thee a morsel לֶ֖חֶם <WH3899> of bread בְּיָדֵֽךְ׃ <WH3027> in thine hand

וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> And she said חַי־ <WH2416> liveth יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> [As] the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> thy God אִם־ <WH518> no יֶשׁ־ <WH3426> I have לִ֣י מָע֔וֹג <WH4580> not a cake כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> no מְלֹ֤א <WH4393> all along כַף־ <WH3709> branch קֶ֙מַח֙ <WH7058> of meal בַּכַּ֔ד <WH3537> in a barrel וּמְעַט־ <WH4592> and a little שֶׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> oil בַּצַּפָּ֑חַת <WH6835> in a cruse וְהִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> behold מְקֹשֶׁ֜שֶׁת <WH7197> and behold I [am] gathering שְׁנַ֣יִם <WH8147> two עֵצִ֗ים <WH6086> sticks וּבָ֙אתִי֙ <WH935> that I may go in וַעֲשִׂיתִ֙יהוּ֙ <WH6213> and dress לִ֣י וְלִבְנִ֔י <WH1121> it for me and my son וַאֲכַלְנֻ֖הוּ <WH398> that we may eat וָמָֽתְנוּ׃ <WH4191> it and die

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלֶ֤יהָ <WH413> then אֵלִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <WH452> And Elijah אַל־ <WH408> not תִּ֣ירְאִ֔י <WH3372> unto her Fear בֹּ֖אִי <WH935> not go עֲשִׂ֣י <WH6213> [and] do כִדְבָרֵ֑ךְ <WH1697> as thou hast said אַ֣ךְ <WH389> but עֲשִׂי־ <WH6213> but make לִ֣י מִ֠שָּׁם <WH8033> me thereof עֻגָ֨ה <WH5692> cake קְטַנָּ֤ה <WH6996> a little בָרִאשֹׁנָה֙ <WH7223> first וְהוֹצֵ֣אתְ <WH3318> and bring לִ֔י וְלָ֣ךְ וְלִבְנֵ֔ךְ <WH1121> for thee and for thy son תַּעֲשִׂ֖י <WH6213> make בָּאַחֲרֹנָֽה׃ <WH314> [it] unto me and after ס

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For כֹה֩ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֨ר <WH559> For thus saith יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel כַּ֤ד <WH3537> The barrel הַקֶּ֙מַח֙ <WH7058> of meal לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תִכְלָ֔ה <WH3615> shall not waste וְצַפַּ֥חַת <WH6835> neither shall the cruse הַשֶּׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> of oil לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תֶחְסָ֑ר <WH2637> fail עַ֠ד <WH5704> until י֧וֹם <WH3117> until the day [תִּתֶּן־ כ] (תֵּת־ <WH5414> sends יְהוָ֛ה <WH5414> sendeth ק) גֶּ֖שֶׁם <WH1653> rain עַל־ <WH5921> on פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> upon הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <WH127> the earth

וַתֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> went וַתַּעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> and did כִּדְבַ֣ר <WH1697> according to the saying אֵלִיָּ֑הוּ <WH452> of Elijah וַתֹּ֧אכַל <WH398> did eat [הוּא־ והיא כ] (הִֽיא־ <WH1931> he וָה֛וּא <WH1931> he ק) וּבֵיתָ֖הּ <WH1004> and she and he and her house יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> [many] days

כַּ֤ד <WH3537> [And] the barrel הַקֶּ֙מַח֙ <WH7058> of meal לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor כָלָ֔תָה <WH3615> wasted וְצַפַּ֥חַת <WH6835> not neither did the cruse הַשֶּׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> of oil לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor חָסֵ֑ר <WH2638> fail כִּדְבַ֣ר <WH1697> according to the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֖ר <WH1696> which he spake בְּיַ֥ד <WH3027> by אֵלִיָּֽהוּ׃ <WH452> Elijah פ

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came אַחַר֙ <WH310> And it came to pass after הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> these things הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these חָלָ֕ה <WH2470> fell sick בֶּן־ <WH1121> [that] the son הָאִשָּׁ֖ה <WH802> of the woman בַּעֲלַ֣ת <WH1172> the mistress הַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> of the house וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> came חָלְיוֹ֙ <WH2483> and his sickness חָזָ֣ק <WH2389> sore מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> was so עַ֛ד <WH5704> against אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> that לֹא־ <WH3808> no נֽוֹתְרָה־ <WH3498> left בּ֖וֹ נְשָׁמָֽה׃ <WH5397> that there was no breath

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And she said אֶל־ <WH413> to אֵ֣לִיָּ֔הוּ <WH452> unto Elijah מַה־ <WH4100> What לִּ֥י וָלָ֖ךְ אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> What have I to do with thee O thou man הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> angels בָּ֧אתָ <WH935> abide אֵלַ֛י <WH413> to me לְהַזְכִּ֥יר <WH2142> to remembrance אֶת־ <WH853> עֲוֹנִ֖י <WH5771> my sin וּלְהָמִ֥ית <WH4191> and to slay אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנִֽי׃ <WH1121> my son

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵלֶ֖יהָ <WH413> to her תְּנִֽי־ <WH5414> unto her Give לִ֣י אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֑ךְ <WH1121> me thy son וַיִּקָּחֵ֣הוּ <WH3947> And he took מֵחֵיקָ֗הּ <WH2436> him out of her bosom וַֽיַּעֲלֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH5927> and carried him up אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעֲלִיָּ֗ה <WH5944> into a loft אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after הוּא֙ <WH1931> he יֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> where he abode שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> in it וַיַּשְׁכִּבֵ֖הוּ <WH7901> and laid עַל־ <WH5921> his own מִטָּתֽוֹ׃ <WH4296> him upon his own bed

וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> And he cried אֶל־ <WH413> about יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> and said יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהָ֔י <WH430> my God הֲ֠גַם <WH1571> also עַל־ <WH5921> unto הָאַלְמָנָ֞ה <WH490> upon the widow אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom אֲנִ֨י <WH589> I am מִתְגּוֹרֵ֥ר <WH1481> with whom I sojourn עִמָּ֛הּ <WH5973> with הֲרֵע֖וֹתָ <WH7489> hast thou also brought evil לְהָמִ֥ית <WH4191> by slaying אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנָֽהּ׃ <WH1121> her son

וַיִּתְמֹדֵ֤ד <WH4058> And he stretched עַל־ <WH5921> upon הַיֶּ֙לֶד֙ <WH3206> himself upon the child שָׁלֹ֣שׁ <WH7969> three פְּעָמִ֔ים <WH6471> times וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> and cried אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> and said יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> O LORD אֱלֹהָ֔י <WH430> my God תָּ֥שָׁב <WH7725> again נָ֛א <WH4994> pray נֶֽפֶשׁ־ <WH5315> soul הַיֶּ֥לֶד <WH3206> I pray thee let this child's הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this עַל־ <WH5921> into קִרְבּֽוֹ׃ <WH7130> into him

וַיִּשְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> heard יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> the voice אֵלִיָּ֑הוּ <WH452> of Elijah וַתָּ֧שָׁב <WH7725> again נֶֽפֶשׁ־ <WH5315> and the soul הַיֶּ֛לֶד <WH3206> of the child עַל־ <WH5921> into קִרְבּ֖וֹ <WH7130> into him וַיֶּֽחִי׃ <WH2421> and he revived

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> took אֵלִיָּ֜הוּ <WH452> And Elijah אֶת־ <WH853> הַיֶּ֗לֶד <WH3206> the child וַיֹּרִדֵ֤הוּ <WH3381> and brought him down מִן־ <WH4480> from הָעֲלִיָּה֙ <WH5944> out of the chamber הַבַּ֔יְתָה <WH1004> into the house וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֖הוּ <WH5414> and delivered לְאִמּ֑וֹ <WH517> him unto his mother וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> said אֵ֣לִיָּ֔הוּ <WH452> and Elijah רְאִ֖י <WH7200> See חַ֥י <WH2416> liveth בְּנֵֽךְ׃ <WH1121> thy son

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said הָֽאִשָּׁה֙ <WH802> And the woman אֶל־ <WH413> to אֵ֣לִיָּ֔הוּ <WH452> to Elijah עַתָּה֙ <WH6258> Now זֶ֣ה <WH2088> Now by this יָדַ֔עְתִּי <WH3045> I know כִּ֛י <WH3588> for אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> that thou [art] a man אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God אָ֑תָּה <WH859> and that וּדְבַר־ <WH1697> [and] that the word יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּפִ֖יךָ <WH6310> in thy mouth אֱמֶֽת׃ <WH571> [is] truth פ
